This line chart contains the time based Evolution of all added and removed Nodes by the student in terms of the individual created Concept Map.
This line chart contains the time based Evolution of all added and removed Relations by the student in terms of the individual created Concept Map.
This line chart contains the time based Evolution of Concept Map Density by the individual created Concept Map by the student.
This line chart contains the time based Evolution of the Concept Map Node-Cover of every Students created Concept Map in terms of the collective aggregated Concept Map.
